column5: I spend as much time out on the water fishing as I can, but I can't eat the fish...  I'm allergic to them.    Although Roy's thread with the bacon wrapped pickerel looks realllly good!
That truly has to suck. I'm a bit the same but i have to catch my fish to eat them i can't go to a store and buy them it's not the same as catching it yourself and eating it.

At least you can fish , my friend cant even come sit on the boat , I like to take a 10 or 15 people to watch the fire works or just go out for a night cruise to Ontario place and even with cleaning up the boat he still cant go out , he got real sick when we went to a korean restraunt where you cook the food at the table and even tho we didnt cook any fish at the table next to us they had fish and the fumes I guess got him.

Luckily for me my allergy isn't that bad, atleast to fish.  Nuts on the other hand are deadly for me.  I can handle the fish all I want, as long as I don't touch the raw flesh, I am good.  I do get the odd hives if I get stuck with one of the fins
I am outside as much as you can and i have all those horrible allergies, ragweed,trees,cutgrass,pollen. You know all the things we fishermen are exposed to shore fishing or even out on the water.
i love to fish, but wouldn't eat a fish if you paid me...
I love eating fish thats not fishy... figure that out!!!
Ain't no fish I won't eat.
we have fish for dinner at least once a week here.  Usually, caught fresh that day. I don't freeze much fish.  Sinker

I too love to eat fish... but I do so in moderation.. not because of my health but for the sake of the fishery.. 3-5 times a year max..  I to have  deathly allergy Bill, Bees... I carry my Epipen for them buggers... which I have to purchase yearly  But my favorite bit.. is my BIL.. that LOVES to fish but will not touch em... some sort of phobia I guess, he will barely touch a minnow... but is a champ at the worms.. (cuts them with scissors) LOL.. Love the guy to death.. but too fun to watch! great entertainment for sure!!!   G
